fields.description: List of attribute names and corresponding values to add to the incoming signals.

exclude.description: If `True`, output signals only contain the attributes specified by `fields`.

nio/ConditionalDynamicFields.Description: Adds a new field, `title`, to input signals. The value of the attribute is determined by the **lookup** parameter. **lookup** is a list of formula/value pairs. In order, the *formula* of **lookup** are evaluated and when an evaluation is `True`, the *value* is assigned to the signal attribute `title`. If multiple formulas match, the first value is the one that is assigned to the signal.

Output.Description: One signal for every incoming signal, modified according to `fields` and `exclude`.
